tool_description: This API takes the URL and returns the correspondent QR code image.
name: QRD
title: QRD

api_list.name: QR Code generation parameters
api_list.description: Endpoint necessary to pass the parameters via a GET request in order to convert the URL to a QR Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qrd1.p.rapidapi.com/qr/www.google.com/yellow/black"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrd1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qrd1.p.rapidapi.com/qr/{url}/{foreground}/{background}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrd1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
